original_title: Ronan Keating: Live From The Royal Albert Hall
overview: Boyzone frontman Ronan Keating goes solo for this live show recorded at the Royal Albert Hall. Includes performances of 'Rollercoaster', 'The Way You Make Me Feel' and 'When You Say Nothing At All', along with a behind-the-scenes documentary and the promo videos for Ronan's first three singles.
title: Ronan Keating: Live From The Royal Albert Hall
